name: Ashcrow
description: Equipment that is famous for its reputation as the gray storm in the flames of war. Its strength has been widely recognized on the battlefield. It is a solid armor for allies and a terror for enemies. Enemies who have heard of Ridious' reputation for a long time, whenever they see this armor on the battlefield, become demoralized and run away one after another, and Ridious has won hundreds of victories because of this.
